00034   //A run time expression
00035   template <typename InterfaceType /* see forwards.h for default argument */>
00036   class rt_unary_expr : public InterfaceType
00037   {
00038     typedef op_interface<InterfaceType>                    op_interface_type;
00039     typedef op_unary<op_id<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>  op_unary_id_type;
00040     
00041       typedef rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>                    self_type;
00042     
00043     public:
00044       typedef typename InterfaceType::numeric_type         numeric_type;
00045       
00046 //       explicit expr(InterfaceType * lhs,
00047 //                     op_interface         * op,
00048 //                     InterfaceType * rhs) : lhs_(lhs), op_(op), rhs_(rhs) {}
00049       rt_unary_expr() {}
00050 
00051       explicit rt_unary_expr(InterfaceType * lhs,
00052                           op_interface_type * op) : expr_(lhs),
00053                                                     op_(op) {}
00054                                                   
00055       explicit rt_unary_expr(InterfaceType * lhs) : expr_(lhs), 
00056                                                  op_(new op_unary_id_type()) {}
00057

00059       explicit expr(LHS const & lhs, OP const & op, RHS const & rhs) 
00060       {
00061         expr(&lhs, &op, &rhs); 
00062       }*/
00063 
00064       template <typename LHS, typename OP, typename RHS>
00065       explicit rt_unary_expr(ct_unary_expr<LHS, OP> const & other) : op_(new OP())
00066       {
00067         std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00068         expr_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs().clone());
00069       }
00070 
00071       explicit rt_unary_expr(rt_variable<InterfaceType> const & other) : expr_(other.clone()),
00072                                                                    op_(new op_unary_id_type())  {}
00073 
00074       template <typename T>
00075       explicit rt_unary_expr(rt_constant<T, InterfaceType> const & other) : expr_(other.clone()),
00076                                                                       op_(new op_unary_id_type()) {}
00077 
00078       template <long value>
00079       explicit rt_unary_expr(ct_constant<value> const & other) : expr_(other.clone()),
00080                                                               op_(new op_unary_id_type()) {}
00081 
00082       //Copy CTOR:
00083       rt_unary_expr(rt_unary_expr const & other) : expr_(other.expr_->clone()), 
00084                                              op_(other.op_->clone()) {};
00085 
00086       //assignments:                           
00087       template <typename LHS, typename OP>
00088       rt_unary_expr & operator=(ct_unary_expr<LHS, OP> const & other) 
00089       {
00090         expr_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs().clone());
00091         op_ = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new OP());
00092         return *this;
00093       }
00094 
00095       rt_unary_expr & operator=(rt_unary_expr const & other) 
00096       {
00097         expr_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs_->clone());
00098         op_  = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(other.op_->clone());
00099         return *this;
00100       }
00101 
00102       template <typename ScalarType>
00103       rt_unary_expr & operator=(rt_constant<ScalarType> const & other)
00104       {
00105         expr_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.clone());
00106         op_  = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_unary_id_type());
00107         return *this;
00108       }
00109 
00110       template <long value>
00111       rt_unary_expr & operator=(ct_constant<value> const & other)
00112       {
00113         return *this = value;
00114       }
00115 
00116       rt_unary_expr & operator=(numeric_type value)
00117       {
00118         expr_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type>(value));
00119         op_  = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_unary_id_type());
00120         return *this;
00121       }

00123       const InterfaceType     * lhs() const { return expr_.get(); }
00124       const op_interface_type * op()  const { return op_.get(); }

00128       //operator() is a convenience layer:
00129       numeric_type operator()(numeric_type val) const
00130       {
00131         return this->eval(val);
00132       }
00133 
00134       template <typename ScalarType>
00135       numeric_type operator()(rt_constant<ScalarType> val) const
00136       {
00137         return this->eval(static_cast<numeric_type>(val));
00138       }
00139       
00140       template <long value>
00141       numeric_type operator()(ct_constant<value> val) const
00142       {
00143         return this->eval(value);
00144       }
00145 
00146       template <typename VectorType>
00147       numeric_type operator()(VectorType const & v) const
00148       {
00149         std::vector<double> stl_v(v.size());
00150         for (size_t i=0; i<v.size(); ++i)
00151           stl_v[i] = v[i];
00152         
00153         return this->eval(stl_v);
00154       }
00155 
00156       numeric_type operator()(std::vector<numeric_type> const & stl_v) const
00157       {
00158         return this->eval(stl_v);
00159       }
00160 
00161       template <typename T0>
00162       numeric_type operator()(viennamath::ct_vector_1<T0> const & v) const
00163       {
00164         std::vector<double> stl_v(1);
00165         stl_v[0] = v[ct_index<0>()];
00166         return this->eval(stl_v);
00167       }
00168 
00169       template <typename T0, typename T1>
00170       numeric_type operator()(viennamath::ct_vector_2<T0, T1> const & v) const
00171       {
00172         std::vector<double> stl_v(2);
00173         stl_v[0] = v[ct_index<0>()];
00174         stl_v[1] = v[ct_index<1>()];
00175         return this->eval(stl_v);
00176       }
00177       
00178       template <typename T0, typename T1, typename T2>
00179       numeric_type operator()(viennamath::ct_vector_3<T0, T1, T2> const & v) const
00180       {
00181         std::vector<double> stl_v(3);
00182         stl_v[0] = v[ct_index<0>()];
00183         stl_v[1] = v[ct_index<1>()];
00184         stl_v[2] = v[ct_index<2>()];
00185         return this->eval(stl_v);
00186       }
00187       
00188       //virtual functions for evaluations
00189       numeric_type eval(std::vector<double> const & v) const
00190       {
00191         return op_->apply(expr_.get()->eval(v));
00192       }
00193 
00194       numeric_type eval(numeric_type val) const
00195       {
00196         return op_->apply(expr_.get()->eval(val));
00197       }

00200       
00201       
00202       InterfaceType * optimize() const
00203       {
00204         if (expr_->is_constant())
00205         {
00206           if (op_->optimizable())
00207             return new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>( op_->apply(expr_->unwrap()) );
00208           else
00209             return new rt_unary_expr(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(expr_->unwrap()),
00210                                      op_->clone());
00211         }
00212 
00213         //TODO: Unwrap op_id()
00214         
00215         return new rt_unary_expr(expr_->optimize(), op_->clone());
00216       }
00217       
00218       bool optimizable() const
00219       {
00220         if (expr_->optimizable())
00221         {
00222           //std::cout << "optimizable(): true in unary_expr" << std::endl;
00223           return true;
00224         }
00225         return false;
00226       }
00227       
00228     
00230       InterfaceType * clone() const { return new rt_unary_expr(expr_->clone(), op_->clone()); }
00231       std::string deep_str() const
00232       {
00233         std::stringstream ss;
00234         ss << op_->str();
00235         ss << "(";
00236         ss << expr_->deep_str();
00237         ss << ")";
00238         return ss.str();        
00239       }
00240       
00241       std::string shallow_str() const
00242       {
00243         return std::string("unary_expr");
00244       }
00245       
00246       numeric_type unwrap() const
00247       {
00248         //if (op_->is_unary())
00249         //  return lhs_->unwrap();
00250         return op_->apply(expr_->unwrap());
00251       }
00252       
00253       //bool is_constant() const { return expr_->is_constant(); };
00254       
00255       InterfaceType * substitute(const InterfaceType * e,
00256                                  const InterfaceType * repl) const
00257       {
00258         if (deep_equal(e))
00259           return repl->clone();
00260         
00261         return new rt_unary_expr(expr_->substitute(e, repl),
00262                               op_->clone());
00263       };
00264       
00265       InterfaceType * substitute(std::vector<const InterfaceType *> const &  e,
00266                                  std::vector<const InterfaceType *> const &  repl) const
00267       {
00268         for (size_t i=0; i<e.size(); ++i)
00269           if (deep_equal(e[i]))
00270             return repl[i]->clone();
00271         
00272         return new rt_unary_expr(expr_->substitute(e, repl),
00273                               op_->clone());
00274       };
00275       
00276       
00277       bool deep_equal(const InterfaceType * other) const
00278       {
00279         if (dynamic_cast<const rt_unary_expr *>(other) != NULL)
00280         {
00281            const rt_unary_expr * temp = dynamic_cast<const rt_unary_expr *>(other);
00282            
00283            return expr_->deep_equal(temp->expr_.get())
00284                   && op_->equal(temp->op_.get());
00285         }
00286         return false;
00287       }
00288       
00289       bool shallow_equal(const InterfaceType * other) const
00290       {
00291         return dynamic_cast< const self_type * >(other) != NULL;
00292       }
00293       
00294       
00295       InterfaceType * diff(const InterfaceType * diff_var) const
00296       {
00297         return op_->diff(expr_.get(), diff_var);
00298       }
00299       
00300       InterfaceType * recursive_manipulation(rt_manipulation_wrapper<InterfaceType> const & fw) const
00301       {
00302         if (fw.modifies(this))
00303           return fw(this);
00304 
00305         return new rt_unary_expr(expr_->recursive_manipulation(fw),
00306                               op_->clone() ); 
00307       }
00308       
00309       void recursive_traversal(rt_traversal_wrapper<InterfaceType> const & fw) const
00310       {
00311         fw(this);
00312         expr_->recursive_traversal(fw);
00313       }
00314       
00315     private:
00316       std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>      expr_;
00317       std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>  op_;
00318   };

00321   template <typename InterfaceType>
00322   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream & stream, rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType> const & e)
00323   {
00324     stream << "unary" 
00325            << e.deep_str()
